content.rendered:
PROGRAM FOR INSPECTION IN TECHNICAL CONTROL CENTERS.

This program is developed under the law and administrative instruction of Ministry of Infrastructure and Environment (MIE).

PURPOSE OF THE TRAINING

The training aims to provide candidates enough knowledge in theoretical and practical work, to be professionally prepared to work as licensed inspectors in these centers.

Conditions for application

Under the conditions provided for by law and the Administrative Instruction no. 2006/10 of MIE, staff (inspectors) of vehicles technical inspection should have completed the technical school of the following fields:

  • Machinery;
  • Mechanic;
  • Auto electrician;
  • Traffic.

Documents required for training

  • High school diploma (original or certified in the municipality);
  • Driving license (photocopy);
  • Form of application;
  • Training fee.

What does this training mean?

In Kosovo there are dozens of licensed centers for technical control of vehicles. In addition to physical conditions and technical equipment, these centers constantly need qualified workers (inspectors) to work in the inspection of motor vehicles.

What after completion of training?

After completion of theoretical training and practical work in CVTC, candidates who successfully pass the final exam will receive certificates and these certificates under MIE issues licenses for inspection. Organized training for all technical control lines.

excerpt.rendered: PROGRAMI PËR INSPEKTUES  TË QENDRAVE  TË KONTROLLIMIT TEKNIK Ky program zhvillohet duke u bazuar në Udhëzimin Administrativ Nr. 2005/10 Qëllimi i trajnimit Trajnimi ka për qëllim që kandidatëve t`ju ofrojë njohuri të mjaftueshme në mësimin teorik dhe punën praktike, për të qenë profesionalisht të përgatitur për punë si inspektues të licencuar në këto qendra. Kushtet […]
